title: Landing
intro: I write a blog. There are some good reads but there more if you subscribe!

sections.heading: Writings
sections.intro: I've written some articles detailing some of my adventures. Give them a read.

items.title: A Beautiful Lie | 009
items.intro: You think you're going crazy, but you're not. You're not alone
items.quote: At this point we’ve learned ways to effectively use PHP and create a project that could take user input and create a card for that information.

items.title: Perpetual Education. So far.
items.quote: The early days were just learning about the computer and to how to turn this machine into a tool for us

items.title: 고인물 [ Goinmul ] | 008
items.quote: The cool thing about learning all these programming tools in PHP is that… it will translate over to other languages that we will be learning in the future.

items.title: Life is perspective | 007
items.intro: And my perspective may differ from yours.
items.quote: Speaking visual language is a tool that has to be mastered. Theres a lot to consider when designing a website for the world to view and critic.

items.title: The more I learn | 005
items.intro: The less I know. The less I know is for the better.
items.quote: I, we started off making a boilerplate. Which, it's basically a template for our code.
